item.title: Video Series That I Reccommend
item.description:
These are just a buncha stuff that I watched and liked, who knows maybe y'all would like them as well!

Content Warnings: Eyestrain, flashing lights, unreality and emergency sirens

Unorthodox Kitten

Thoughts on the series: Pretty hard to understand but cool to look at, Unorthodox Kitten has a lot of really interesting mathematical concepts inside of it. If you enjoy hard to understand, spooky vibe, eldritch stuff, you'll probably like Unorthodox Kitten's videos. Also the songs the creator put in the background are really good and fit the visuals well.

All Episodes



Content Warnings: Eyestrain, flashing lights, child abuse, body horror, gore and death

Bloody Bunny: The First Blood

Thoughts on the series: I'll be upfront here: I've never watched any other media related to Bloody Bunny other than this one, and I'll have to say: It is so cool and awesome. The animation, the action, the blood and gore. It's all a feast for the eyes and boy am I begging the waiter for more.

All Episodes



Content Warnings: Body horror, gore and robot death

Internecion Cube

Thoughts on the series: Internecion Cube was Liam Vickers' other series about cool robots that kill each other. Although I haven't watched Murder Drones yet, if you enjoyed that one, you're sure to enjoy this one. Wanna see a weird cube thing speak in japanese and do some cool anime shit? That happens here, go watch it.

All Episodes



Content Warnings: Eyestrain, flashing lights, unreality, and child death.

The June Archive And Restoration Project

Thoughts on the series: Wanting to go back to simpler times is something everyone wants to do. This series explores that AND much more. Lotsa good animation and a banger song in one of the episodes. This horror series also doesn't focus much on jumpscares, so when there is one, you'll genuinely be caught off guard

All Episodes



Content Warnings: None

Satina

Thoughts on the series: Cool animation and really cool backgrounds. I laughed a lot when watching it. I don't laugh a lot ingeneral when it comes to these sorts of things, so I think it's pretty funny. The dynamics between the characters bounce off each other pretty well.

All Episodes
item.dc:creator: MECHAGIC
